                   b   o   d   y       i   d   =   "   d   p   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   a   w   n   _   a   n   d   _   g   a   r   d   e   n       e   n   _   U   S       a   -   a   u   i   _   4   9   6   9   7   -   c       a   -   a   u   i   _   5   1   7   4   4   -   c       a   -   a   u   i   _   a   t   t   r   _   v   a   l   i   d   a   t   i   o   n   s   _   1   _   5   1   3   7   1   -   c       a   -   a   u   i   _   b   o   l   t   _   4   6   6   3   2   -   c       a   -   a   u   i   _   b   o   l   t   _   4   8   8   9   1   -   c       a   -   a   u   i   _   u   x   _   4   7   5   2   4   -   c       a   -   a   u   i   _   u   x   _   4   9   5   9   4   -   c   "   &gt;   d   i   v       s   t   y   l   e   =   '   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :   n   o   n   e   ;   v   i   s   i   b   i   l   i   t   y   :   h   i   d   d   e   n   ;   '   &gt;   
                   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   /   /   f   l   s   -   n   a   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   1   /   b   a   t   c   h   /   1   /   O   P   /   A   T   V   P   D   K   I   K   X   0   D   E   R   :   1   9   1   -   0   2   6   3   9   2   9   -   9   1   1   1   3   4   5   :   0   Q   Z   1   H   5   J   S   4   V   R   X   K   R   Y   T   V   1   3   M   $   u   e   d   a   t   a   =   s   :   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   H   U   F   0   O   2   C   %   2   F   u   e   d   a   t   a   %   2   F   n   v   p   %   2   F   u   n   s   t   i   c   k   y   %   2   F   1   9   1   -   0   2   6   3   9   2   9   -   9   1   1   1   3   4   5   %   2   F   D   e   t   a   i   l   %   2   F   n   t   p   o   f   f   r   w   %   3   F   s   t   a   t   i   c   b   %   2   6   i   d   %   3   D   0   Q   Z   1   H   5   J   S   4   V   R   X   K   R   Y   T   V   1   3   M   %   2   6   p   t   y   %   3   D   D   e   t   a   i   l   %   2   6   s   p   t   y   %   3   D   G   l   a   n   c   e   %   2   6   p   t   i   %   3   D   B   0   0   I   7   Q   A   O   F   K   :   1   0   0   0   '       /   &gt;

  h   e   i   g   h   t   :   4   6   p   x   }   #   n   a   v   b   a   r   .   n   a   v   -   s   e   a   r   c   h   -   s   w   a   p       #   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   c   a   r   t   ,   #   n   a   v   b   a   r   .   n   a   v   -   s   e   a   r   c   h   -   s   w   a   p       #   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   p   r   i   m   e   ,   #   n   a   v   b   a   r   .   n   a   v   -   s   e   a   r   c   h   -   s   w   a   p       #   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   s   h   o   p   A   l   l   ,   #   n   a   v   b   a   r   .   n   a   v   -   s   e   a   r   c   h   -   s   w   a   p       #   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   w   i   s   h   l   i   s   t   ,   #   n   a   v   b   a   r   .   n   a   v   -   s   e   a   r   c   h   -   s   w   a   p       #   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   y   o   u   r   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   {   m   a   r   g   i   n   -   t   o   p   :   -   2   p   x   }   #   n   a   v   b   a   r   .   n   a   v   -   s   e   a   r   c   h   -   s   w   a   p       #   n   a   v   -   l   o   g   o   -   b   o   r   d   e   r   f   a   d   e   {   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :   n   o   n   e   }   .   p   o   l   l   -   i   m   a   g   e       {   m   a   x   -   w   i   d   t   h   :       1   0   0   %   ;                    s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   d   e   c   l   a   r   a   t   i   v   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   c   t   i   o   n   =   "   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   i   s   E   m   a   i   l   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   Y   s   0   I   v   b   0   Z   H   J   4   R   K   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   H   U   F   0   O   2   C   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   H   U   F   0   O   2   C   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   d   =   B   0   0   H   U   F   0   O   2   C   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   a   =   t   a   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   t   =   s   h   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   H   U   F   0   O   2   C   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;                                                    a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   5   7   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   P   i   n       i   t       o   n       P   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   Y   s   0   I   v   b   0   Z   H   J   4   R   K   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   p   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   p   i   n   %   2   F   c   r   e   a   t   e   %   2   F   b   u   t   t   o   n   %   3   F   u   r   l   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   H   U   F   0   O   2   C   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   Y   s   0   I   v   b   0   Z   H   J   4   R   K   %   2   6   t   i   t   l   e   %   3   D   K   a   n   b   r   o   o   k   %   2   5   2   0   G   r   i   l   l   %   2   5   2   0   B   r   u   s   h   %   2   5   2   0   H   e   a   v   y   %   2   5   2   0   D   u   t   y   %   2   5   2   0   S   t   a   i   n   l   e   s   s   %   2   5   2   0   S   t   e   e   l   %   2   5   2   0   -                                                    }

                   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   i   z   e   -   b   a   s   e       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   b   a   s   e   "   &gt;   !   -   -       M   s   g   I   d   :   c   f   s   _   f   r   e   e   _   s   h   i   p   p   i   n   g   _   e   l   i   g   i   b   l   e   _   i   n   l   i   n   e   :   w   e   b       -   -   &gt;

           o   b   j   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   I   f   r   a   m   e       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (       i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   ,       o   n   l   o   a   d   F   n       )       {   
                   v   a   r       i   f   r   a   m   e       =       d   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   '   i   f   r   a   m   e   '   )   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   i   d       =       i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   c   l   a   s   s   N   a   m   e       =       "   a   p   _   n   e   v   e   r   _   h   i   d   e   "   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   w   i   d   t   h       =       "   1   0   0   %   "   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   s   c   r   o   l   l   i   n   g   =   "   n   o   "   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   f   r   a   m   e   B   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   ;   
                   i   f       (       i   f   r   a   m   e   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r       )   
                           i   f   r   a   m   e   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,       o   n   l   o   a   d   F   n   ,       f   a   l   s   e   )   ;   
                   e   l   s   e       i   f       (       i   f   r   a   m   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   E   v   e   n   t       )   
                           i   f   r   a   m   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   E   v   e   n   t   (   "   o   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,       o   n   l   o   a   d   F   n   )   ;   
                   e   l   s   e       i   f   r   a   m   e   .   o   n   l   o   a   d       =       o   n   l   o   a   d   F   n   ;   
                   r   e   t   u   r   n       i   f   r   a   m   e   ;       
           }   
           o   b   j   .   i   n   i   t   i   a   l   i   z   e       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k   ,       n   e   e   d   W   i   d   t   h   A   d   j   u   s   t   )       {

   	           I   f       t   h   i   s       r   e   v   i   e   w       i   s       i   n   a   p   p   r   o   p   r   i   a   t   e   ,       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   g   p   /   v   o   t   i   n   g   /   c   a   s   t   /   R   e   v   i   e   w   s   /   2   1   1   5   /   R   3   C   E   Q   F   R   3   I   B   1   W   9   W   /   I   n   a   p   p   r   o   p   r   i   a   t   e   /   1   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   c   r   _   d   p   _   a   b   u   s   e   _   v   o   t   e   y   n   /   1   9   1   -   0   2   6   3   9   2   9   -   9   1   1   1   3   4   5   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;t   a   r   g   e   t   =   &amp;t   o   k   e   n   =   C   7   9   1   4   0   1   D   E   C   5   1   1   4   9   4   6   D   9   D   8   C   1   6   7   9   7   8   8   0   3   6   1   D   F   D   3   2   F   C   &amp;v   o   t   e   A   n   c   h   o   r   N   a   m   e   =   R   3   C   E   Q   F   R   3   I   B   1   W   9   W   .   2   1   1   5   .                                    d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   "   &gt;

   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

   a   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       p   (   )   {   g   &amp;&amp;g   .   i   s   S   t   u   b   &amp;&amp;g   .   r   e   p   l   a   y   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   ,   b   ,   c   )   {   a   =   a   [   0   ]   ;   b   =   a   [   h   ]   =   a   [   h   ]   |   |   {   }   ;   b   [   f   ]   =   b   [   f   ]   |   |   c   ;   r   (   a   )   }   )   ;   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   =   r   ;   g   =   n   u   l   l   }   i   f   (   !    A   )   }   )   ,   A   =   q   (   "   ,   "   ,   "   @   "   ,   "   |   "   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   .   i   d   }   )   ,   g   =   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   ;   y   &amp;&amp;u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   (   {   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   :   "   c   s   m   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   a   :   [   {   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   N   a   m   e   :   "   c   s   m   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   s   "   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   :   [   {   i   d   :   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   -   t   r   a   c   k   i   n   g   "   }   ]   }   ]   ,   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   :   {   c   s   m   :   1   }   ,   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   -   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   s   "   }   )   ;   k   ?   p   (   )   :   (   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   ,   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   b   e   f   o   r   e   u   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   )   ;   d   .
